scripts.build:linux: npm run prebuild && bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/vv-ddl-gen && chmod +x dist/vv-ddl-gen
scripts.build:win: npm run prebuild && bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/vv-ddl-gen.exe
scripts.buildjs: npm run prebuild && node_modules/.bin/tsc --outDir distjs && tsc-esm-fix distjs
